Urban Harvest

Urban Harvest is a (free) informal network. We're based in North London. Anyone is welcome to use the mailing list and calendar to publicise activities, ask queries and look for other foragers in their neighbourhood.

Website: http://www.UrbanHarvest.org.uk

Twitter: UrbanHarvestUK
